sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../Context/AuthContext'; function Nav() { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const { user, logout, isBranchManager } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; return (
{/* Logo */}

AquaLink

{/* Desktop Navigation */}
{user?.role === 'Branch Manager' ? ( // Branch Manager Navigation <> Dashboard Orders Inventory Recycle Bin Drivers Emergency ) : user?.role === 'Factory Manager' ? ( // Factory Manager Navigation <> Dashboard Orders Inventory Reports Settings ) : user?.role === 'Admin' ? ( // Admin Navigation <> Dashboard Add Employee Add Branch ) : user?.role === 'Customer' ? ( // Customer Navigation <> Dashboard Products Services Branches ) : ( // Default Navigation for unauthenticated users <> Home Products Services About Contact )}
{/* Profile Menu */}
{/* Dropdown Menu */}
{user?.email}
{user?.role === 'Branch Manager' && (
{user?.branchName} - {user?.branchLocation}
)}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile Navigation */}
{user?.role === 'Branch Manager' ? ( // Branch Manager Mobile Navigation <> setMenuOpen(false)} > Dashboard setMenuOpen(false)} > Orders setMenuOpen(false)} > Inventory setMenuOpen(false)} > Recycle Bin setMenuOpen(false)} > Drivers setMenuOpen(false)} > Emergency ) : user?.role === 'Factory Manager' ? ( // Factory Manager Mobile Navigation <> setMenuOpen(false)} > Dashboard setMenuOpen(false)} > Orders setMenuOpen(false)} > Inventory setMenuOpen(false)} > Reports setMenuOpen(false)} > Settings ) : user?.role === 'Admin' ? ( // Admin Mobile Navigation <> setMenuOpen(false)} > Dashboard setMenuOpen(false)} > Add Employee setMenuOpen(false)} > Add Branch ) : user?.role === 'Customer' ? ( // Customer Mobile Navigation <> setMenuOpen(false)} > Dashboard setMenuOpen(false)} > Products setMenuOpen(false)} > Services setMenuOpen(false)} > Branches ) : ( // Default Mobile Navigation for unauthenticated users <> setMenuOpen(false)} > Home setMenuOpen(false)} > Products setMenuOpen(false)} > Services setMenuOpen(false)} > About setMenuOpen(false)} > Contact )} {/* Logout button for authenticated users */} {user && ( )}
); } export default Nav;
